TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapServerFormatterSink extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink
type SoapServerFormatterSink = class interface IServerChannelSink interface IChannelSinkBase

summary.span: 为使用 的服务器格式化程序接收器提供实现。

span.span: Provides the implementation for a server formatter sink that uses the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 直到它达到适当的格式化程序接收器，从服务器传输接收器通过服务器信道接收器将传播的请求流。The request stream propagates from the server transport sink through the server channel sinks until it reaches the appropriate formatter sink. 格式化程序接收器反序列化消息，并将其传递通过管道。The formatter sink deserializes the message and passes it through the pipeline. 在通过的信道接收器链的末尾插入特殊调度接收器由服务器信道创建信道接收器链的服务器调用的方法。A special dispatch sink is inserted at the end of the channel sink chain by method, which is called by server channels to create the server channel sink chains. 当消息到达调度接收器时，调度接收器将消息传递到远程处理基础结构。When the message reaches the dispatch sink, the dispatch sink passes the message to the remoting infrastructure. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`includeVersions`|指定格式化程序是否将包含版本信息。Specifies whether the formatter will include versioning information. 值为`true`或`false`。Values are `true` or `false`.| |`strictBinding`|指示在仅使用类型名称和程序集名称（无版本信息）之前，接收格式化程序首先试着使用完整的版本信息（如果有的话）来标识类型。Indicates that a receiving formatter will first try to identify the type using complete version information if it exists before using only the type name and assembly name without version information. 值为`true`或`false`。Values are `true` or `false`. 系统提供的两个格式化程序的默认值均为 `false`。The default for both system-provided formatters is `false`.| |`typeFilterLevel`|服务器信道尝试指定的自动反序列化级别的字符串值。A string value specifying the level of automatic deserialization a server channel attempts. 支持的值为`Low`（默认值） 和`Full`。Supported values are `Low` (the default) and `Full`. 有关反序列化级别的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 远程处理中的自动反序列化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/5dxse167(v=vs.100))。For details about deserialization levels, see [Automatic Deserialization in .NET Framework Remoting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/5dxse167(v=vs.100)).

此属性仅受.NET Framework 1.1 版上的以下平台：Windows 98、 Windows NT 4.0、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000，Windows XP Home Edition、 Windows XP Professional 和 Windows Server 2003 系列。This property is supported only by the .NET Framework version 1.1 on the following platforms: Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, and Windows Server 2003 family.| > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用此对象的实例，对不受信任的数据或跨不安全通道是安全风险。Using an instance of this object with untrusted data or across an unsecure channel is a security risk. 使用此对象仅与受信任的数据以及跨安全通道。Use this object only with trusted data and across a secure channel. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

span.span: Sinks and Sink Chains

related.span: .NET Framework 远程处理中的自动反序列化

span.span: Automatic Deserialization in .NET Framework Remoting

summary.span: 获取或设置 执行的自动反序列化的 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of automatic deserialization the performs.

value.span: 表示当前自动反序列化级别的 。

span.span: The that represents the current automatic deserialization level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持的值为`Low`（默认值） 和`Full`。Supported values are `Low` (the default) and `Full`. 有关反序列化级别的详细信息，请参阅[.NET 远程处理中的自动反序列化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/5dxse167(v=vs.100))。For details about deserialization levels, see [Automatic Deserialization in .NET Remoting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/5dxse167(v=vs.100)).
